txt.en: Clever use of the shield greatly improves your buffs from Shield Gambits.
+[placeholder] Melee Damage Reduction from Readied Blade\n+[placeholder] Ranged and Tactical Damage Reduction from Shield Up
+[placeholder] Physical Mitigation from Dance of War.\n+[placeholder] Tactical Mitigation from Conviction.
+[placeholder] Incoming Healing from Persevere\n+[placeholder] Partial Parry from Impressive Flourish\n+[placeholder] Partial Evade and +[placeholder] Threat Generation from Maddening Strike
